EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Retail - eBook Phase.Send Email 5.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New Article: Grocery & C Store Traffic and Safety Trends
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Store traffic patterns shifted wildly during the first few months of the pandemic. Though they bottomed out back in April, they’ve since rebounded.But recent studies show there’s a new factor that’s influencing store traffic today. And it’s something you can easily factor into your plans at {{company.Company Name:default=your store}}.See what it is, plus other trends and guidance in our article. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
